channel.title: 667/*** slayer tower spikey chains
channel.description:
hi im kind of stuck on the spikey chains at the slayer tower, i made climing up work but you cant climb back down it and there are also two diffrent spikey chains to climb up on diffrent floors and they have the same id so idk how to set 2 diffrent locations for 1 object id? :/ i need help on how to get climbing up and down working too plz :/
any tips will be helpful or a guide? :/

item.title: 667/*** slayer tower spikey chains
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“khayam, post:1, topic:471191”]hi im kind of stuck on the spikey chains at the slayer tower, i made climing up work but you cant climb back down it and there are also two diffrent spikey chains to climb up on diffrent floors and they have the same id so idk how to set 2 diffrent locations for 1 object id? i need help on how to get climbing up and down working too plz

any tips will be helpful or a guide? :/[/quote]

Possible solutions:

  1. Condition the Object Click (chain) based upon not only the Object I.D. but also the Player Character’s current Tile Coordinates. This is a cheap ‘fix’ to enable you to work around the duplicate Object I.D.

  2. You can do this exactly like you have your Stairs. The Slayer Tower Shortcuts are all pretty much Stairs anyway.

Read full topic
